docTitle.titlePart: NINE LIVES OF A CAT by CHARLES BENNETT
THE NINE LIVES of A CAT A TALE OF WONDER by CHARLES BENNETT . Author of “ Shadows ”

titlePage.docImprint: LondonGriffith and Farran . Corner of St Pauls ’ Churchyard .1860.

div.head: PREFACE
div.p: This tale of wonder is told for children ; with which view , it has been carefully designed and very nicely printed .
For some time past , it has arrived at the dignity of a popular Nursery Tale in the Author 's family ; and it is hoped it will merit the same good fortune elsewhere .

It will be worth while explaining , that the circle in each page is made to represent some object in connection with the story ; and , that as some of them have proved rather puzzling , to Juvenile admirers has been left the task of “ finding them out . ”

body.p: How many Lives has the Cat got ? NINE ! But when she was young , Poor Kitty was hung ; So how many Lives has the Cat got ?

lg.l: She pulled a knife out of her side-

body.p: How many Lives has the Cat got ? EIGHT ! But , when she was rounder , A boy tried to drown her ; So how many Lives has the Cat got ?

lg.l: Yes , a boy tried to drown her
She slipped the stone off her neck ,

body.p: How many Lives has the Cat got ? SEVEN ! But , as I have learnt , Poor Pussy was burnt . So how many Lives has the Cat got ?

lg.l: She jumped into the water-butt before

body.p: How many Lives has the Cat got ? SIX ! But she fell off the house , Running after a mouse ; So how many Lives has the Cat got ?

lg.l: Yes , she fell off the house
Before you could count ONE , TWO ,
THREE , she came on her feet .

body.p: How many Lives has the Cat got ? FIVE ! But I hear she has not ; For they say she was shot . So how many Lives has the Cat got ?

lg.l: Yes , with a gun she was shot ,
And a trigger it had got ,
I saw the man pull it ;
But Pussy held up her paws like the

body.p: How many Lives has the Cat got ? FOUR ! But people all say She was poison 'd one day ; So how many Lives has the Cat got ?

lg.l: And very much it shock 'd her ;
But the moment she felt ill , and before you
she was off to the Doctor .

body.p: How many Lives has the Cat got ? THREE ! But then the old wall Crush 'd her in its fall . So how many Lives has the Cat got ?

lg.l: Yes , I know the old wall
And a dozen of her fellows ;
But Pussy walked sideways into the kitchen ,
and before you could count ONE , TWO ,

body.p: How many Lives has the Cat got ? TWO ! But , bit by a dog , She is dead as a log . So how many Lives has the Cat got ?

lg.l: But not dead as a log ,
For she climbed up the apple-tree before
you could count ONE , TWO , THREE ,

body.p: How many Lives has the Cat got ? ONE ! But then she 's grown old , And has caught a bad cold ; So how many Lives has the Cat got ?

lg.l: And has caught a bad cold ,
Only bread and milk she touches ,
Except a little gruel , but she burns a great
deal of fuel , and you may count ,
ONE , TWO , THREE , a great many times ,
while she hobbles across the room on her

body.p: How many Lives has the Cat got ? NONE ! Is it true then , as they said , That poor old Puss is dead , So many lives as she 'd got ?

lg.l: Yes , the song has all been said ,
And poor old Puss is dead ,
Although not ONE , TWO , THREE , but
